name: com.unity.material-switch
description: Provides tools for switching and blending material parameters over a number of renderers simultaneously using Timeline.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
* doc: SpriteSwitchClip 

### Changed

### Fixed
* fix: prevent users to add MaterialGroup and SpriteGroup manually
* fix: hide SpriteSwitchEventInvoker GameObject
